title: K2 Mindbender 85 Skis 2023
content: These skis are amazing. They have great responsiveness and are perfect for carving turns.

title: K2 Mindbender 85 Skis 2023
content: These skis are great for all-mountain skiing. They are responsive and stable.

title: K2 Mindbender 85 Skis 2023
content: These skis are ok but I have some issues with them. They can be a bit twitchy at high speeds.

title: K2 Mindbender 85 Skis 2023
content: These skis are not the best. They are too stiff and not very responsive.

title: K2 Mindbender 85 Skis 2023
content: These skis are terrible. I would not recommend them to anyone.
